metadata.title: CVE-2017-11331 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The wav_open function in oggenc/audio.c in Xiph.Org vorbis-tools 1.4.0allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory allocationerror) via a crafted wav file.

criterions.comment: vorbis-tools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
